mistakes.mistake: Removed multi-agent system without proper analysis
mistakes.impact: Lost specialized expertise and coordination capabilities
mistakes.lesson: Always research industry standards before architectural changes
mistakes.preventionStrategy: Always conduct thorough research on architectural decisions before implementation

mistakes.lesson: Research database optimization best practices first
mistakes.preventionStrategy: Implement proper analysis and validation before making system changes
